title: Main Landing Page Load and Display
description: Verify that the main landing page loads correctly with all UI components including banners, category filters, and project cards visible and functional.

steps.description: Navigate to the main landing page
Verify the main banner is displayed with expected images and text
Verify the category filters are displayed and selectable
Verify that a list of project cards is shown with project title, summary, and thumbnail
Select each category filter one by one
Ensure project cards update accordingly to selected category

title: Project Detail Page Display and Interaction
description: Verify correct display of project detail information and interaction features including likes, comments, sharing, and viewing images.

steps.description: From the main landing page, select a project card to open the project detail view
Verify project details display correct description, technologies used, creator info, likes count, and comments list
Click the like button
Verify likes count increments and like status is updated
Submit a new comment
Verify comment appears immediately in the comments section
Click the share button and select a sharing method
Verify sharing modal/dialog appears and share action completes
Click on project images to open ImageDialog
Verify ImageDialog shows image details with navigation and close options

title: User Registration with Validation
description: Ensure users can register with valid input fields including nickname, category preferences, and email, and that validations properly handle invalid inputs.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Enter valid and unique nickname, email, password and select valid category preferences
Submit registration form
Verify registration succeeds and user account is created
Attempt registration with empty or invalid nickname/email/password
Verify appropriate validation error messages are displayed
Attempt registration with duplicate nickname or email
Verify error message for duplicate user data is shown

title: User Login and Authentication
description: Validate that email/password login and Google social login authenticate users correctly with proper error handling for invalid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid email and password credentials
Click login button
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to My Page/dashboard
Log out user
Attempt login with invalid email or password
Verify appropriate error message is displayed and user is not logged in
Click Google social login button and complete OAuth flow with valid account
Verify user is authenticated via Google and redirected to My Page/dashboard
Attempt Google social login and cancel the OAuth flow
Verify user is not authenticated and appropriate message or no action occurs

title: My Page Dashboard Functionality
description: Confirm full management capabilities on My Page including project management, wishlist, comments, 1:1 inquiries, and profile settings with real-time updates.

steps.description: Login and navigate to My Page/dashboard
Verify display of user projects, wishlist, comments, 1:1 inquiries, and profile information
Add a new project with valid details and submit
Verify project appears in project list and portfolio
Edit an existing project and save changes
Verify changes are reflected in the project detail and lists
Remove a project and confirm deletion
Verify project is removed from user portfolio and listings
Add and remove items in wishlist
Verify wishlist updates accordingly
Respond to or create new 1:1 inquiries
Verify inquiries list updates and responses are stored correctly
Modify profile settings including nickname and category preferences
Verify profile updates are saved and displayed consistently

title: Connection Marketplace Job Postings and Proposals
description: Test job and outsourcing listings display correctly and proposal submission works, including validation and confirmation dialogs.

steps.description: Navigate to the connection marketplace section
Verify job and outsourcing listings are displayed with details such as project descriptions
Select a job posting and view detailed job description
Verify detailed job information including contact and proposal submission options is visible
Submit a proposal with valid required information
Verify proposal is accepted and confirmation message is shown
Attempt to submit proposal with missing required fields
Verify validation errors prevent submission and show explanatory messages

title: Profile Page Display and Data Accuracy
description: Ensure profile pages accurately display user info, projects, likes, following and follower counts with consistency and completeness.

steps.description: Navigate to a user’s public profile page
Verify profile information including nickname, category preferences, and profile photo are displayed
Verify projects uploaded by user are listed with correct titles and preview info
Verify counts for number of likes received, followers and following are correct
Click on follower and following counts
Verify lists of followers and following users appear correctly

title: Error Handling on Invalid URL and Network Failures
description: Check the system handles invalid routes and network failures gracefully with user-friendly error messages and retry options.

steps.description: Navigate to an invalid or non-existent URL within the app
Verify an appropriate 404 error page or message is displayed with navigation options
Simulate network failure during page load or API calls (e.g. project list, profile data)
Verify error message is shown indicating failure to load data
Attempt to retry loading the data
Verify retry attempts succeed or continue to show error as applicable

title: Responsive UI Components Verification
description: Verify header, footer, banner, card layouts, and dialogs render correctly and are usable on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop screen size
Verify header, footer, main banner, project cards, dialogs display correctly and are aligned
Resize or open the app on tablet screen size
Verify UI components rearrange or scale properly maintaining usability and readability
Open the app on a mobile device or emulator
Verify header switches to mobile navigation, footers scale properly, content is scrollable and dialogs fit screen

title: Security Tests for Authorization and Access Control
description: Ensure user data and privileged actions are protected; unauthorized users cannot access or modify restricted content.

steps.description: Attempt to access My Page or submission forms without login
Verify access is denied and user is redirected to login or view-only pages
Login as a user and attempt to edit or delete another user’s project or profile data by navigating URLs directly
Verify unauthorized modifications are blocked and proper error message returned
Submit like, comment, or proposal actions without authentication
Verify system blocks actions and prompts for login
Verify secure logout clears session and tokens
Verify protected routes are inaccessible after logout
